description: The classic story of the Three Bears translated into the Cherokee Language. Cherokee Syllabary only. Suitable for young native readers and students of the language. ᎧᏃᎮᏗ Ꮎ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏲᎾ ᎠᎴ ᎤᏲᏒ ᎠᎨᏳᏣ. ᏂᎦᏓ ᏣᎳᎩ ᎦᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗ. ᎥᏝ ᎩᎵᏏ ᏱᎩ. ᏌᏊ ᎢᏳᏩᎦᏘ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏲᎾ ᎠᏁᎮ . . .
subjects: Foreign Language Study, Native American Languages
title: Na Anijoi Yona - The Three Bears
